description: From international scientific vocabulary, reflecting New Latin combining forms, from lymph- +‎ adenitis = lymph- +‎ aden- +‎ -itis.

nouns.description: lymphadenitis (plural lymphadenitides or lymphadenitises or lymphadenites) (the last is nonstandard and rare)

entries.meaning: (biology, medicine) Inflammation or swelling of lymph nodes; it is often a nonspecific sign of infection but is also often of obscure origin and benign.
examples: Hypernyms: lymphadenopathy, adenitis, adenopathy (all often synonymous in imprecise use)
